overview: A profile of Michael Foot, the former leader of the Labour Party, which included footage of him on the night of Tony Blairâ€™s historic 1997 victory, and interviews with his wife, the filmmaker Jill Cragie, and some of his old colleagues and friends, including Barbara Castle, Spike Milligan and Salman Rushdie.
tagline: A Film Portrait of Michael Foot
title: Labour's Old Romantic
